r.s: Library to edit audio properties and tags on MPEG and OGG files
r.d: KTaglib is a PHP binding for the KDE taglib, which reads and writes tags for various audio files
r.n: - Add Windows compatibility (David). - Add OGG Tag support (Anatoliy). - Add OGG Audio properties support (Anatoliy). - Add $create parameter to getID3v2 and getID3v1 (David). - Add setMimeType, getMimeType to AttachedPictureFrame (David). - Add getType, setType and corresponding constants to AttachedPictureFrame (David). - Fix unitialized values (David). - Fix an issue when saving the a picture (David). - Fix return value of addFrame() - Fix a heap overflow in MINFO.
